original_text: For if we go on sinning deliberately after receiving the knowledge of the truth, there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins,
korean_text: 우리가 진리를 아는 지식을 받은 후 짐짓 죄를 범한즉 다시 속죄하는 제사가 없고

sentences.original_text: For if we go on sinning deliberately
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 우리가 고의로 계속 죄를 짓는다면

sentences.original_text: after receiving the knowledge of the truth,
there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins,
